Text: It would help if you would actually put up a link to the info, save, update, demo, and screenshots.  That said, thank you for sharing.

DeathMarine DOES post a link, which Piratebay then deletes because his site apparently has some ads on it. 

It WOULD be nice to get more info on his torrents, but he's already giving us free torrents...

What would be nicer is some UNcensored games... :)
